Package fr.vinvin129.budgetmanager.models.budget_logic

Class Budget

java.lang.Object
fr.vinvin129.budgetmanager.events.Observable
fr.vinvin129.budgetmanager.models.budget_logic.Budget
public class Budget extends Observable
Represent a Budget. He can contains some Category
Author:
vinvin129

  • Constructor Details

    • Budget

      public Budget(String name, double allocationPerMonth) throws IllegalBudgetSizeException
      create a budget instance
      Parameters:
      name - budget name
      allocationPerMonth - money added in the balance each month
      Throws:
      IllegalBudgetSizeException - when allocationPerMonth is under than 1

  • Method Details

    • setAllocationPerMonth

      public void setAllocationPerMonth(double allocationPerMonth) throws BudgetTooSmallException
      change the allocation per month for this Budget
      Parameters:
      allocationPerMonth - money added in the balance each month
      Throws:
      BudgetTooSmallException - thrown if allocationPerMonth is too big for the actual allocation per month of attached Budget

    • setAllocationPerMonthOfCategory

      public void setAllocationPerMonthOfCategory(Category category, double allocationPerMonth) throws BudgetCategoryTooSmallException, CategoryTooBigException, IllegalCategorySizeException
      change the allocation per month of a Category in this Budget
      Parameters:
      category - the Category to change allocation
      allocationPerMonth - money added in the balance each month
      Throws:
      BudgetCategoryTooSmallException - thrown if allocationPerMonth is too big for the actual allocation per month of attached Budget
      CategoryTooBigException - thrown if allocationPerMonth is too big for the actual allocation per month of attached Budget
      IllegalCategorySizeException - thrown when Category allocation is more small than 1.

    • newMonth

      public void newMonth()
      increment balance with allocation per month

    • addCategory

      public void addCategory(Category category) throws BudgetTooSmallException
      add a Category to this Budget
      Parameters:
      category - the Category object
      Throws:
      BudgetTooSmallException - when there is no more place in this budget

    • removeCategory

      public void removeCategory(Category category)
      remove a Category to this Budget
      Parameters:
      category - the Category object

    • getCategories

      public Category[] getCategories()
      get Category list of categories in this budget
      Returns:
      Category list

    • addSpent

      public void addSpent(Spent spent) throws BudgetNotContainCategoryException
      add an expense to expense list of the Category in Spent object. This Category need to be in this Budget
      Parameters:
      spent - the Spent object
      Throws:
      BudgetNotContainCategoryException - thrown if the Category specified in Spent isn't contains here
